title: Dropping LP without playing ranked

embed.description: League of Legends Summoner data forHarigzakje 72889932 in euw. Contains statistics, match data and more to help players analyze and improve performance.

body:
Hello everybody,

I have a weird problem. I lose LP without playing ranked. The last time i checked i had 19 lp(last ranked game a week ago), today i check and i have 6 lp. I didnt play ranked, i didnt leave a Champion select and i also didnt get a penalty for bad behaviour or something.
This is the second time such a strange thing happend to me. The first time i was playing my promo's for gold, my series was 1 win 1 lose, than i lose another one and my series was suddenly over, when i still had chance to win my series. So this is the second time such a strange thing happend to me.
I would realy like to have some explanation for my LP problem, why i lose LP when i dont play ranked. 

Thanks for your time
Harigzakje

replies.body: Hey there, I looked into this for you and I do see 2 queue dodges.  :(  These occurred on the 16th of this month within an hour of each other.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Hey, thanks for your comment. No i dont think so, because that "dodges" were not Rankeddodges, that were Aramdodges. Or can u also lose LP if u dodge aram?

To clarify, those 2 dodges were specifically for ranked games and not ARAM.  You'll lose LP for dodging ranked games, and [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) can escalate from 3 to 10 regardless of what mode is queue dodged.
